zh.name: API 模糊测试与漏洞赏金
zh.desc: 针对 Web API 进行漏洞挖掘和 Fuzzing 测试的技巧。
zh.full_desc: 专注于 API 安全性。该技能指导你如何使用 ffuf、wfuzz 等工具对 API 接口进行暴力枚举、注入测试和未授权访问检查，旨在帮助安全研究员在漏洞赏金计划中发现高质量的逻辑漏洞。

en.name: API Fuzzing & Bug Bounty
en.desc: Vulnerability research and Fuzzing techniques targeting Web APIs.
en.full_desc: Focused on API security. This skill guides you through using tools like ffuf or wfuzz to perform brute-force enumeration, injection testing, and unauthorized access checks to find high-impact logic bugs in bug bounty programs.
